did.unittitle: James Jesse Strang papers

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The collection contains letters to and from James Jesse Strang and some third party correspondence. There is a meteorological journal from Beaver Island, Michigan, which includes notes on the fishes and shells of the area, Strang's diary covering 1831-1836, and documents of the Order of the Illuminati.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Unspecified, please consult the appropriate curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The James Jesse Strang Papers are the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Jesse Strang Papers. Yale Collection of Western Americana, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
Box 6: Restricted fragile material. Reference surrogates have been substituted in the main files. For further information consult the appropriate curator.

p.ref: James Jesse Strang Collection, WA MSS 447

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: James Jesse Strang (1813-1856), was a founder of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints (Strangite). The collection contains letters to and from James Jesse Strang and some third party correspondence. There is also a meterological journal from Beaver Island, Michigan, which includes notes on the fishes and shells of the area, Strang's diary covering 1831-1836, and documents of the Order of the Illuminati.

did.unittitle: Journal (WA MSS S-186)
Strang, James Jesse. Meteorological Journal, St. James [Mich.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records cover Dec 1850 - July 1851, Sep 1852 - May 1856. Also includes "Fishes of Beaver Island Harbour", "Shells and shell-fish" and "Vibrations of mercury in the thermometer".

did.unittitle: Strang Letterbook (WA MSS S-187)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The numbers to the left of the description refer to letter number; documents are bound in the contemporary letterbook in no discernable order. All letters are to James Jesse Strang unless otherwise specified.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Some pages missing; most mutilated. Partly in cipher. Includes 15 leaves listed in Withington, Western Americana Manuscripts , 447.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photostatic copy & typescript available for general use. For original, see: Restricted Fragile Papers.

did.unittitle: Order of the Illuminati Covenant (WA MSS S-189)
Order of the Illuminati. Covenant rituals and lists of members.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The covenant of the secret order within the Strangite Mormon church, signed by the members, and lists of members added up to 1870.

did.unittitle: Restricted Fragile Papers

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted fragile material. Reference surrogates have been substituted in the main files. For further information consult the appropriate curator.
